title: The Nuclear age
creator_credit: Julian Ware, Nihon Hoso Kyokai, WGBH (Boston) and Central Independent Television (UK)
brief_description: The Nuclear Age is a documentary series which provides a definitive account of the momentous events in the 40 year history of the nuclear arms race from the first atomic explosion to the signing of the INF Treaty.
creator_credit_for_label: Julian Ware, Nihon Hoso Kyokai, WGBH (Boston) and Central Independent Television (UK)
